job_offer.job_description: The job involves writing unit and integration tests, as well as debugging existing code. It also requires monitoring and maintaining applications to ensure their performance and security.
requirements: Min 4 years of relevant experience on similar positions
Knowledge in technologies such as Python 3.x, GIT(lab)
Basic knowledge of REST API/swagger, Docker, Pytest
benefits: Flexible working conditions in a stable company
Additional benefits (health insurance, sports facilities, free book subscription - up to 3 times per month)
